thread.title: Danielle Lloyd says Nicola McLean has "always fancied" Jamie O'Hara and something could happen in Celebrity Big Brother
thread.title_full: Danielle Lloyd says Nicola McLean has "always fancied" Jamie O'Hara and something could happen in Celebrity Big Brother

author: Vicki Newman
title: Danielle Lloyd says Nicola McLean has "always fancied" Jamie O'Hara and something could happen in Celebrity Big Brother
text:
Danielle Lloyd says Nicola McLean has "always fancied" Jamie O'Hara and something could happen in Celebrity Big Brother She says she wouldn't be surprised if something happened between Nicola and her ex-husband Share Danielle Lloyd says Nicola McLean has "always fancied" Jamie O'Hara Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Danielle Lloyd says she wouldn't be surprised if something happened between her ex-husband and Nicola McLean in the Celebrity Big Brother house and claims she's "always fancied him". 
The mum-of-three's ex has been enjoying some on-screen flirting with his housemate during their time on the Channel 5 reality show. 
But now, Danielle has suggested there could be more to it than innocent flirting. 
Danielle, who has three sons with Jamie, has said she "cringed" while watching the scenes unfold on TV. Read More Danielle Lloyd says Nicola has "always fancied" Jamie (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
Nicola has been married to Cyprus international footballer Tom Williams since 2009. They have two sons. 
Danielle told OK! magazine : "I wouldn’t be surprised if something happens between them in the house. 
"I think she’s always fancied him. She’s obviously really hurt about Tom cheating on her. If she hadn’t referred to me as a ‘Wannabe WAG’ and implied I am a ‘d*
